results.content: It is a good course for an intermediate level but will be slightly difficult for beginners as flexbox and CSS grides are not described broadly. The instructor should have used a split-screen to show us how the code is changing the layout. Overall e good course.
results.content_html: It is a good course for an intermediate level but will be slightly difficult for beginners as flexbox and CSS grides are not described broadly. The instructor should have used a split-screen to show us how the code is changing the layout. Overall e good course.

results.content: Very good explanations and concepts of floats, flex and grids by Abhilash. Now I have a better understanding and their advantages, disadvantages, etc., Its up to me now to apply these concepts in real world projects. Thank you, more courses with in-depth explanations expected from you. Cheers!!!

Thank you, more courses with in-depth explanations expected from you. Cheers!!!

results.content: Awesome course with real world examples

The course was short and sweet and to the point. The question in the title of the course was answered and an example was provided, so I got everything that I expected from this course and more. It was very helpful to be shown how css layouts have evolved because it gives insight on the improvements of newer techniques and why css grid is "The Hulk".

response.content: Exactly. You got the point. Glad to get the feedback. Thanks.
response.content_html: Exactly. You got the point. Glad to get the feedback. Thanks.

results.content: I think the course give good idea on css floats, flex, and grid. But to dive deep into flex or grid, this is not advisable. Flex and Grid could have been explained in much more detail. It will be good if all the available properties are used or explained a little to use.
results.content_html: I think the course give good idea on css floats, flex, and grid. But to dive deep into flex or grid, this is not advisable. Flex and Grid could have been explained in much more detail. It will be good if all the available properties are used or explained a little to use.

results.content: This was a very useful course that helped me finally see side-by-side the differences between floats, FlexBox, and CSS Grid. I coded along with him, therefore I picked up on what was happening.  As a bonus, I learned several useful Emmet tricks. The last lecture on CSS Grid was amazing!
results.content_html: This was a very useful course that helped me finally see side-by-side the differences between floats, FlexBox, and CSS Grid. I coded along with him, therefore I picked up on what was happening. As a bonus, I learned several useful Emmet tricks. The last lecture on CSS Grid was amazing!

results.content: Useful and to the point. Floats is indeed tedious and problematic.
